Protein Names: Dual-specificity RNA methyltransferase RlmN (EC 2.1.1.192) (23S rRNA (adenine(2503)-C(2))-methyltransferase) (23S rRNA m2A2503 methyltransferase) (Ribosomal RNA large subunit methyltransferase N) (tRNA (adenine(37)-C(2))-methyltransferase) (tRNA m2A37 methyltransferase)
Organism: Vesicomyosocius okutanii subsp. Calyptogena okutanii (strain HA)
